verses.text: The day comes on apace! Soon shall his face at last; Who trust the Saviour's grace Shall see his face at last. The clouds that now obstruct their sight Shall quickly all be put to flight.
Ye saints, lift up your heads; Salvation draweth nigh; So the Redeemer said, Its radiance through the sky! Oh, let the sight your spirits cheer! The Lord himself will soon appear.
